name: inefficiently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not well organized or skilled and wastes time, energy, money, etc.: The hotel is inefficiently run. When wood burns inefficiently, it creates smoke. See
inefficient
More examplesFewer examplesThere is not enough aid, and what there is is spent inefficiently.The land is being used inefficiently.The law should be seen as a way to keep taxes from being spent inefficiently.
